text: Ezɨ Filistian mɨdorozir gumazir uan averpenibar itiba ko, mɨdorozir gumazir nguibabagh arua mɨsoziba ko, Filistian igharaziba bar, mɨdorozir eghaghanir kam baregha nɨgha bar atiatingi. Ezɨ mɨkɨmkɨzim nguazimɨn oto. Ezɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God Filistiabar nɨghnɨzibagh amizɨ da ikuvizɨ me tintinibar are.
